title: Lesson 06 - One Minute Irish
description: In lesson 6 of One Minute Irish you will learn how to introduce yourself in Irish. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Irish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com
content:encoded: In lesson 6 of One Minute Irish you will learn how to introduce yourself in Irish. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Irish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com
itunes:subtitle: Learn to introduce yourself in Irish
